alert.note: Alert for Tulsa; Wagoner (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:14AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern McIntosh, southwestern Wagoner, northeastern Okmulgee, northwestern Muskogee and southeastern Tulsa Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 414 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles south of Bixby to 2 miles east of Bald Hill to 3 miles north of Schulter. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Muskogee... Okmulgee... Bixby... Checotah... Haskell... Morris... Porter... Oktaha... Taft... Boynton... Council Hill... Rentiesville... Tullahassee... Stonebluff... Bald Hill... Liberty... Wainwright... Summit... Redbird... Hitchita... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 255 and 267. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
